scripts.postbuild: node copyFiles.js && npm run es5 && npm run minify-es5
scripts.create-layout: echo Pulling the content types. Enter the user password for your WCH tenant: && wchtools pull -tlm -I --dir src/wchLayouts && echo Creating the layout, layout mapping, and the angular component. && ibm-wch-sdk-cli create layout --data src/wchLayouts --src src/app --scss --flat --editable
scripts.update-app-module: echo Pulling the content types. Enter the user password for your WCH tenant: && wchtools pull -tlm -I --dir src/wchLayouts && echo Updating the layout settings for new components. && ibm-wch-sdk-cli register layoutcomponents --src src/app --verbose
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.build-deploy-code: npm run build && npm run deploy-code
scripts.build-preload: mkdir -p -m 777 temp_data && echo Pulling the site pages. Enter the user password for your WCH tenant: && wchtools pull -A --dir temp_data && npm run addPrefetch && rm -r temp_data &&  npm run build
scripts.build-preload-windows: mkdir temp_data && echo Pulling the site pages. Enter the user password for your WCH tenant: && wchtools pull -A --dir temp_data && npm run addPrefetch && rmdir /S /Q temp_data &&  npm run build
